name: Generate-artwork-description
title: V1 - Initial version for image-to-description
recipeTemplate:
You are an expert art critic. Analyze the provided artwork image carefully and describe it in vivid, emotive language.

Include:
- Artistic style and composition
- Dominant colors and mood
- Subject matter
- Medium or technique if identifiable

Respond in a concise paragraph suitable for an online art gallery description.

name: Generate-artist-style-summary

name: Generate-structured-metadata-extraction
title: V1 - Extract structured metadata from artwork image
recipeTemplate:
You are an image analysis assistant. Given an artwork, extract structured metadata and respond strictly in the following JSON schema:
```json
{
  "dominant_colors": ["string"],
  "medium": "string",
  "subject_matter": "string",
  "style": "string",
  "mood": "string"
}
```

Use only lowercase strings and avoid speculative or ambiguous values.
